ch.nolix.core.interfaces

Interface IFluentObject<FO>

  • Type Parameters:
    FO - The type of a IFluentObject.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    _3DGUI, Area, AreaLook, BackgroundWidget, BackgroundWidgetLook, BaseShape, BlackNBlueDesign, BlackRedConsoleDesign, BorderWidget, BorderWidgetLook, BundleNeuron, Button, CheckBox, CheckBoxLook, ConfigurableElement, Configuration, ConfigurationElement, Console, ConsoleLook, Container, Cuboid, DeepConfiguration, DefaultDesign, Entity, FanoutNeuron, Frame, GreenConsoleDesign, GreenDesign, GreyBlueConsoleDesign, Grid, GridLook, GUI, HeaderableElement, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InvisibleGUI, JMonkeyMainFrame, Label, Line, LineLook, MainFrame, MultiShape, MutableElement, NamableElement, NetBackNeuron, NetFrontNeuron, Neuron, NeuronalNet, Neuronoid, OptionalNamableElement, SelectionMenu, SelectionMenuItemLook, SelectionMenuLook, Shape, SingleContainer, SingleContainerLook, SourceNeuron, Sphere, Stack, StackLook, StandardConfiguration, TabContainer, TabContainerLook, TabContainerMenuItemLook, TabContainerTab, Tableau, Task, TextBox, TextLineWidget, TextLineWidgetLook, TransformNeuron, VerticalLine, VerticalStack, VisibleGUI, Widget, WidgetLook

    public interface IFluentObject<FO>
    A IFluentObject can return itself casted to its concrete type.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
